text: The Ice Storm is a 1997 American drama movie. The movie is about two families in New Canaan, Connecticut who are dealing with politics and serious social matters in November 1973. These two families do that using adultery, alcohol and sexual experimenting. Christina Ricci, Elijah Wood and Kevin Kline are in the cast. The Ice Storm received very positive reviews from the critics. Its performance at the box office, however was terrible: the movie only got back close to half its $18 million budget. This movie was released in the United States in autumn 1997. == Other websites == * Category:1997 drama movies Category:Adultery in movies Category:American drama movies Category:English- language movies Category:Movies directed by Ang Lee Category:Movies set in Connecticut Category:Movies set in the 1970s Category:Screenplays by James Schamus
title: The Ice Storm
